mapper.insert: insert into work_support ( support_no, category, r_dept_code, s_dept_code, support_title, support_content, start_date, end_date, mem_no, status, create_date ) values ( seq_wsno.nextval, #{category}, #{rdCode}, #{mem.deptCode}, #{supportTitle}, #{supportContent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{mem.memNo}, default, default )
mapper.select: select count(support_no) from work_support where status = 'Y' and r_dept_code like #{deptCode}

select support_no, category, r_dept_code, s_dept_code, support_title, support_content, start_date, end_date, mem_no, d.dept_name, create_date from work_support w, department d where s_dept_code = d.dept_code and w.status = 'Y' and r_dept_code like #{deptCode} order by 1 desc

select support_no, category, r_dept_code, s_dept_code, support_title, support_content, start_date, end_date, mem_no, status, create_date, bo_att_no, bo_origin_name, bo_change_name, file_path, bo_division, ref_bno, dept_name from work_support left join board_attachment on (ref_bno = support_no) join department on (dept_code = s_dept_code) where support_no = #{sno} and status = 'Y'
mapper.update: update work_support set category = #{category}, r_dept_code = #{rdCode}, support_title = #{supportTitle}, support_content = #{supportContent}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate} where support_no = #{supportNo}
mapper.select: select bo_att_no, bo_origin_name, bo_change_name, file_path, bo_division, ref_bno, support_no from board_attachment, work_support where ref_bno = #{supportNo} and support_no = ref_bno
mapper.update: update work_support set status = 'N' where support_no = #{sno}
